message.disclaimer: These results are based on what you told us. You will need to apply to a service to find out if you're eligible. Likewise, you may be eligible for more services than listed here. Keep in mind that you have the right to apply for these services, regardless of these results.

message.servicesRemoved: Since your last visit some services have been removed from this list. You can always <2><0>start over</0></2>.

report.recommend: We recommend sharing this list so you can refer back to it anytime.

error.title: Oops...
error.validation: Please answer all questions to continue.

intro.body:
Answer a few quick questions, and we'll help you explore services that may make a difference.

We won't store or share the info you provide. See our <1>Privacy Policy for more information.

howItWorks.stepOne: Answer the next few questions as best as you can. This isn't an application, so it's okay if you have to guess.
howItWorks.stepThree: Select the services you'd like to learn more about (you'll be able to print or share the list).
howItWorks.stepTwo: View the services that match your answers.
howItWorks.title: Here's how it works:

intro.title: Find services that can help
